# Sketch Utils

Utility functions for Sketch plugins

## Usage

+ Git clone or subtree
+ e.g. ```git subtree add --prefix vendor https://github.com/dunckr/sketch-utils master —squash```
+ Import into sketchplugin file
+ e.g. ```#import 'vendor/utils.js'```
